text: Do I need to parametrize the type of field in struct if this field is not touched by the constructor? I mean any case the struct is mutated after...

elements.text: Do I need to parametrize the type of field in struct if this field is not touched by the constructor? I mean any case the struct is mutated after...

text: You don't need to do it, but if you want to have it type stable, you might have to do it.

text: On a different note - are you sure you need your structs to be mutable? are the fields ever reassigned after initialisation?
